location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP ACCOMPANYING MILITARY REPORT ON PERSIA Vol. IV. Part 2.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 352 x 275mm, on sheet 437 x 335mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part II. The map shows a region of central and southern Persia, indicating regions, cities, towns, roads, tracks, the routes of overland and submarine telegraph lines, and hydrology.The map bears a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office, No. 3423, April. 1923.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
